name: LaptopTrace
overview:
LaptopTrace is a great software service that provides you with a extra defence against thiefs. The most basic version, LaptopTrace Free, is of course free of charge and all you will have to do is to register on the website to download the software.

LaptopTrace features a small hidden application on your laptop. By creating an account on the website, you will receive access to Laptop Tracking Software called LaptopTrace. Installation of the software works fast and easy. You can monitor the location of your laptop at anytime from any computer by using the LaptopTrace website.

The LaptopTrace Advanced and Pro versions offer even more functionality and greater ease of use, including dedicated support and remote file access to your laptop. When properly installed on your computer, the software will run (in the background) and log on to the website on a regular basis. On each visit it will save your computers IP-adress into our database so that you (or the Police preferably) can track it if stolen.
